ygData.subject: Re: Has the Lugubrious Lament Been Nerfed??
ygData.msgSnippet: It has been this way for me for some time.  Lament 2 blue Dervishes with my mandolin, run up and punch the third in the face, get chased by one of the
ygData.messageBody:
It has been this way for me for some time. Lament 2 "blue" Dervishes with
my mandolin, run up and punch the third in the face, get chased by one of
the dervishes supposedly lamented. This is -without- the "fails" message
which sometimes sends the whole camp at me. Same with frogloks, orcs, dead,
whatever else.

Seems random, but I've had it happen with all sorts of creatures from Qeynos
to Kelethin. For several weeks at least, personally. Used to never be like
this.

Roop
